name: Korean Beef Bulgogi
description: Marinated Korean BBQ beef with sweet and savory flavors. An addictive classic of Korean cuisine.

instructions.instruction: Make marinade: combine grated pear, soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, garlic, ginger and pepper.
Add beef slices to marinade, mix thoroughly.
Refrigerate for minimum 2 hours, ideally overnight.
instructions.tip: Pear tenderizes the meat - don't skip it.

instructions.instruction: Heat a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add marinated beef and onions to pan.
instructions.tip: Don't overcrowd - cook in 2 batches if needed.

instructions.instruction: Cook over high heat 8-10 minutes until caramelized.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds. Serve.

tips: Freeze beef 30 minutes for easier slicing.
High heat is essential for caramelization.
Apple or kiwi can substitute for pear.
Serve in lettuce wraps or over rice.
storageInfo: Marinated beef keeps 2 days, cooked 3 days refrigerated.
servingSuggestion: Serve with white rice, kimchi and pickled vegetables.
variations: Add gochujang (Korean chili paste) for spicier version.
